whisper-base-ar-quran.description: Tarteel Whisper Base model - Balanced accuracy and speed. WER: 5.75%. Uses standard Transformers/Hugging Face implementation.
whisper-base-ar-quran.recommended_for: General use, good balance of accuracy and speed

faster-whisper-base-ar-quran.description: Faster Whisper version of Tarteel Base model - Up to 4x faster than standard Transformers. Uses CTranslate2 engine. Same accuracy as whisper-base-ar-quran but significantly faster.
faster-whisper-base-ar-quran.recommended_for: Production use, fastest option for macOS

whisper-tiny-ar-quran.description: Tarteel Whisper Tiny model - Fastest but lower accuracy. WER: 7.05%. Lightweight model suitable for resource-limited environments.
